name: Impossible Baking starring A Guinea Pig
name_original: Impossible Baking starring A Guinea Pig
description:
Momoro-chan, your clubmate, has lost legendary recipe somewhere in the school that she was going to use to win the club event! You are tasked to look around in other clubs to help her find it. Will you succeed in finding the lost recipe...or romance instead?

Artists - Nicole Rin, Vanessa Ong

Narrative Designer - Alvin Koh

Programmers - Jonathan Tang, Jian Hua
